TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed UIPermissionClipboard extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of clipboard access that is allowed to the calling code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This enumeration is used by <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard AllClipboard = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Clipboard can be used without restriction.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard NoClipboard = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard OwnClipboard = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The ability to put data on the clipboard (, ) is unrestricted. Intrinsic controls that accept , such as text box, can accept the clipboard data, but user controls that must programmatically read the clipboard cannot.
